statements: SELECT * FROM products ORDER BY product_id DESC
SELECT product_name, unit_price FROM products WHERE unit_price > 50
SELECT product_name, units_sold FROM products WHERE units_sold < 100 ORDER BY units_sold ASC
SELECT * FROM products WHERE product_id = 3
SELECT product_name, revenue FROM products WHERE revenue BETWEEN 1000 AND 5000 ORDER BY revenue DESC
SELECT product_name, unit_price FROM products WHERE units_sold > 100 ORDER BY unit_price DESC
SELECT * FROM products WHERE revenue > 50000 ORDER BY product_id ASC
SELECT product_name, SUM(units_sold) AS total_units_sold FROM products GROUP BY product_name HAVING total_units_sold > 200
SELECT AVG(unit_price) AS average_price FROM products
SELECT product_name, unit_price * units_sold AS total_revenue FROM products
SELECT * FROM products
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics'
SELECT product_id, category, price FROM products ORDER BY price DESC
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM products ORDER BY category ASC
SELECT * FROM sales WHERE sale_date >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT * FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics' AND price > 500 ORDER BY product_name DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT product_name, category, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM products JOIN sales ON products.product_id = sales.product_id GROUP BY product_name, category ORDER BY total_quantity DESC
SELECT product_id, product_name, category, price FROM products WHERE price BETWEEN 100 AND 200 ORDER BY price ASC
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE product_id IN (1, 3, 5) OR category = 'Toys' AND price < 50
SELECT * FROM products WHERE product_name LIKE '%apple%' OR category = 'Fruits' AND price >= 2.99 ORDER BY price ASC, product_name DESC
SELECT * FROM products;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE category='Electronics';
SELECT product_id, product_name, price FROM products ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM products WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY category ASC;
SELECT strategy_name, audience, effectiveness FROM marketing_strategies;
SELECT product_id, product_name, price, category FROM products WHERE price > 50 ORDER BY product_name DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT strategy_name, audience, effectiveness FROM marketing_strategies WHERE effectiveness >= 4.5 ORDER BY effectiveness DESC, strategy_name ASC;
SELECT product_name, price, category FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics' ORDER BY price DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE price <= 100 AND category = 'Clothing' ORDER BY product_name ASC;
SELECT sale_id, product_id, sale_date, quantity, total_amount FROM sales WHERE quantity > 10 AND total_amount > 100 ORDER BY sale_date ASC, total_amount DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT product_name, sales_amount FROM top_selling_products;
SELECT sale_id, sale_date, sale_amount FROM sales_performance;
SELECT strategy_name, target_audience FROM marketing_strategies;
SELECT category_id, category_name, product_id FROM product_categories;
SELECT product_name, sales_amount, product_id FROM top_selling_products WHERE sales_amount > 1000;

SELECT product_name, sales_amount FROM top_selling_products ORDER BY sales_amount DESC;

SELECT product_name, sales_amount FROM top_selling_products WHERE sales_amount > 1000 ORDER BY sales_amount DESC;
SELECT product_name, sale_amount FROM top_selling_products JOIN sales_performance ON top_selling_products.product_id = sales_performance.product_id ORDER BY sale_amount DESC;

SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE price > 100;

SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;

SELECT customer_id, customer_name, email FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name ASC
